title: BCD_TO_INT (Function)
text:
FUNCTION BCD_TO_INT : INT
Converts one byte in BCD format into an INT value
Example in ST:
i
:=
BCD_TO_INT
(
73
);
(* Result is 49 *)
k
:=
BCD_TO_INT
(
151
);
(* Result is 97 *)
l
:=
BCD_TO_INT
(
15
);
(* Output -1, because it is not in BCD format *)

rows.Name: BCD_TO_INT
rows.Comment: Value as INT for the inputB

rows.Name: B
rows.Comment:
Value in BCD code. If the value is not in the BCD format,
then the output is -1.
